Translations.Text: Ih, ayagi, siwa d asnulfu imezwura
Ur nelli d wid ara ippuaaqben
Nekoen t. Nesqucc iten. Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Tamud skaddben imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen UuUalie: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Day a kwen ooen, deg wayen illan dagi, testumnem
Di tebeirin akked tliwa
deg igran, tizdayin s ppemoa leqqaqen
La tneooem, d ccaioin, ixxamen deg idurar
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur ssemeaset i lameo iballa$en
i issefsaden di tmurt, ur pleqqimen
Nnan: "kecc, aql ak kan, seg ioehbaniyen
Kecc d amdan kan, am nekwni. Awi d assekni, ma d tidep ay tessawalev
Inna: "tal$wemt agi, a ppessew deg wass is, kunwi a ppesswem deg wass nnwen
Â£uowat a p tevvuoem, mulac a kwen iwwet uaaqeb, deg wass abarar
Gezmen as tigwecrar, gwran d di nndama
Iwwet iten uaaqeb. Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
